漏洞标题: Student Study Center Desk Management System存在SQL注入漏洞
影响产品: Student Study Center Desk Management System Student Study Center Desk Management System
漏洞描述:
Student Study Center Desk Management System是学生学习中心办公桌管理系统。
Student Study Center Desk Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取数据库敏感信息。
